inkscape:path-effect.message: Ctrl + click on existing node and move it

tspan.tspan: - number of messages, pictures, links, videos,
- similar channels (based on overlap in users)

text.tspan: - shared media: photo, video, docs, link previews...

tspan.tspan: - start from from search (limited), previous studies (e.g. Pushift dataset at https://zenodo.org/
- expand with forwarded content and channel URLs in text

text.tspan: - Hard (no going back): user real names, username, phone nr, profile picture
- Soft / pseudo (1 way hashing + mapping saved separately): user IDs + channels' ID, username and title
